docs.text: Browser sign in to do In this document you can find all the websites that need signing for my day-to-day function Bitwarden extension Firefox (in zen) brightspace.au.dk drive.google.com (and youtube.com) bluesky Reddit

docs.text: This is a list of the macOS settings that needs to be set manually Turn off animations Enable three-finger swipe down (app-expose) Reduce motions System settings -> Accessibility -> Display -> Reduce motion Enable keyboard shortcut for space 1-5
docs.title: This is a list of the macOS settings that needs to be set manually

docs.text: Turn off animations Enable three-finger swipe down (app-expose) Reduce motions System settings -> Accessibility -> Display -> Reduce motion Enable keyboard shortcut for space 1-5
docs.title: This is a list of the macOS settings that needs to be set manually

docs.text: To do list for a fresh install This to do list is for my personal mac machine. A more elaborate to do list system will come at some point. Run the steps in the readme. Sign in to app store Maybe run nixswitch once more. Setup basic preferences Import plist into raycast Start alt-tab Change keyboard shortcut to cmd+tab Sign in to (and setup for machine-start) bitwarden Cloud storage that needs signing in: OneDrive Dropbox Import settings (plist) into stats. Sign in to outlook app
docs.title: To do list for a fresh install
